entry.title: Purpose of This Blog
entry.content:
Okay, so I have this new blog on GitHub Pages and I intent to use this space for thing I come across in my life as an Ruby On Rails developer. Also I might note some links/snippets here for public use and reference. If you have any handy tips, snippets or just want a shout out please @davidakachaos on Twitter.

I'm creating this blog with Octopress a fine tool for creating an simple blog.
